title: ZFSNode
description: ZFSNode is the Schema for the zfsnodes API

items.description: Pool specifies attributes of a given zfs pool that exists on the node.

free.description: Free specifies the available capacity of zfs pool.

used.description: Used specifies the used capacity of zfs pool.

uuid.description: UUID denotes a unique identity of a zfs pool.
